nodes.name: 1 Hour Mods
nodes.summary: Brief gameplay addition miscellaneous mods that I created in one hour - more or less.-Bugger off-Fargoth's Property Downgraded-Not Telvanis not Mages Guild-Morrowind Comes Alive Nerfed Leveled List for Tamriel Rebuilt

nodes.name: Immersive Spitting
nodes.summary: Makes NPCs spit randomly with visible saliva model on the floor.

nodes.name: Vvardenfell and Dark Brotherhood Crossover
nodes.summary: -Compatibility patch for To Serve Sithis by Emyn & Vvardenfell Brotherhood by Caeris-Fixed bugs in Emyn's mod-Reflected Emyn's quests through conditions that were absent -Possibility to join two factions in sensical manner  -Conflict

nodes.name: You n'wah
nodes.summary: Camonna Tong cracks your little n'wah skulls in your sleep. Enjoy being outlander bashed.

nodes.name: Cliff Racer Grabs You
nodes.summary: Mod makes cliff racers live up to their name. Now cliff racers drag you and drop you from deadly heights! Watch your back outlander.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Questline Overhaul
nodes.summary: Mod preserves the original Morrowind Fighters Guild questsline while adding new ways to complete quests.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Main Quests Overhauled
nodes.summary: Collection of plugins which overhaul the main quests from the Fighters Guild storyline. Alternative solutions to plain killing.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Egg Poachers Arrest or Go
nodes.summary: Small part of my incoming Fighters Guild Questline Overhaul Mod optionally allows player to bring the egg poachers from Fighters Guild quest to be brought to justice at Imperial fort or you can let them go. If you choose to let them go you

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Find Pudai Eggmine Info
nodes.summary: Simple mod that provides info on how to find the Pudai Eggmine if you follow the correct trail of rumours.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Engaer Bounty Fall to the Death
nodes.summary: Stealth way to trick Engaer and stage "accidental" death. Also you can warn Engaer about the hit job if you like roleplaying as Telvanni House member and complete the quest by sparing him.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Telasero Delaying Consequences
nodes.summary: Simple modification that makes Sondaale of Shimmerene rescue critical depending on how much time you take to complete the quest. If you procrastinate expect the cultists from the Sixth House to do their job and turn her into corprus

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Sujamma to Dunirai Addon
nodes.summary: Mod offers:-extra quest that cuts down on backtracking in Fighters Guild Sujamma to Dunirai quest-bully Fargoth-defend Fargoth from Hrisskar -bully Fargoth together with Hrisskar-fist fights with Hrisskar and Fargoth-wanted posters if you

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Tenim Bounty Alternative
nodes.summary: Extensive overhaul to Fighters Guild quest - Tenim's Bounty - new choices and consequences plus two new optional quests.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Flin for Elith-Pal
nodes.summary: No more boring fetch and bring quest. Now you will encounter alcoholic Khajiit. Fight for you flin or join his alcoholic binge. You can still do the quest old boring fashion way if you want.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Suran Bandits
nodes.summary: Minor overhaul of the quest to provide alternative way of dealing with Saturan bandits in non-violent way. In addition there is a side quest related to bandits in Saturan, Dranas Sarathram and his slave.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Beneran Bounty Alternatives
nodes.summary: You can spare Beneran and his bandits and do small task for him - one new quest. Optionally you can still choose to slay him or lie to Percius Mercius that you killed him.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Vas Alternative Outcomes
nodes.summary: Make a deal with necromancer Daris Adram or opt out of Ulyne vs. Daris standoff altogether. Vanilla way of doing the quest is unchanged.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Spare Telvanni Agents
nodes.summary: If you're Thieves Guild member or joined Telvanni House you can spare the agents near Calder Mine.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Nchurdamz Dark Deal
nodes.summary: Make a deal with daedra Hrelvesuu rip Larienna Macrina heart out and get daedric rewards. Or just stay out of Macrina and Hrelvesuu standoff altogether without loosing much* of reputation points with Fighters Guild. You can still do the

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Spare Orc Bounty
nodes.summary: Extensive overhaul of Morrowind short and simple bounty quest - Gra-Bol's Bounty / FG_OrcBounty

nodes.name: No one is Above the law - Go to Jail Patch
nodes.summary: Compatibility patch for No one is Above the law and Go to Jail.

nodes.name: Fighters Guild Spare Khajiit Bounty
nodes.summary: Simple and short mod that gives you option to spare Dro'Sakhar's life who has a bounty on his head. Fighters Guild quest - Dro'Sakhar's Bounty.
